It IS confusing. For the curious: as the world warms, weather patterns shift. 

Arctic ice melts. A Connecticut town gets 40” of snow overnight. People in India die of heat. A cold wave dips down from the Arctic to hit the Midwest.

Global warming—>climate change—>climate chaos.
